packages.name: Mitsubishi Electric Thermostat
packages.description: Unified set of drivers for Mitsubishi Air Conditioners (Thermostats), including those linked to the MELCloud service in Europe, MELView service in Australia and New Zealand, as well as the KUMO Cloud service in the USA.

packages.name: SensorPush Gateway
packages.description: Device driver for reading current SensorPush Temperature readings from cloud storage into virtual temperature sensor device on Hubitat hub
